organizations: Hartford Wolf Pack of the American Hockey League
lead_paragraph: The Rangers re-signed the restricted free agents Jed Ortmeyer and Bryce Lampman yesterday. Ortmeyer, a forward, had 5 goals and 2 assists in 78 games last season. Lampman, a defenseman for the Hartford Wolf Pack of the American Hockey League, missed most of last season with a dislocated shoulder.
